name: VR Forest Wildlife Safari Adventure
description:
VR Forest Wildlife Safari Adventure brings to you the most Thrilling and Adventurous experience of a Jungle Jeep Safari. With Amazing 3D environment of Jungle and Realistic graphics and Animations of the Animals, VR Forest Wildlife Safari Adventure provides you with the Perfect Environment for Safari ride across the Beautiful yet deadly Jungle. Save yourself from the deadly Wild Animals as they don’t spare those who enter their territory.

Try to escape from the Animals and save yourself from the Static Obstacles to get to the Camp to complete the level. There are multiple levels which can be unlocked by completing previous levels. Then there is survival mode, try to run Endless as far as you can and get escaped from animals as much as you can to score High.

The animals which are unlocked in the level panel will be available in survival mode. So for more thrill and adventure unlock all the animals and dare to cross the jungle without being attacked by the Deadly and Fierce Animals.

Game Play:
Save yourself from animals, get to the camp to complete the level and unlock more levels. Take Fuel from the path to keep driving the jeep, and mushrooms for the health of the player. Save yourself from the static obstacles and don’t enter into the water. Unlock more animals to get them in the survival mode and score as much as you can by covering more distance.

Features:
>> Great Controls of Jeep
>> Realistic Graphics and Animations.
>> More than 20 Static Obstacles
>> Deadly and Fierce predators.
>> Great Environment
>> HD Features
>> Attack Sounds and animations of Animals.
>> Multiple animals.
